metadata.synopsis: An non-hostile NPC reacts to a player (not a summon) "attacking" them out of combat, but doing no damage at all, e.g. through a critical miss. Note: this may also be because of beneficial action, like throwing a healing potion (which is the main reason we added this). Unfortunately, we can't differentiate between the two.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Throw a healing potion onto an NPC

0.speaker: GROUP_Animals, GROUP_Bugbear, GROUP_Constructs, GROUP_Daisy, GROUP_Demons, GROUP_Desire, GROUP_Dragons, GROUP_Dwarves, GROUP_Elves, GROUP_Gith, GROUP_Gnolls, GROUP_Gnomes, GROUP_Goblins, GROUP_HalfElves, GROUP_Halflings, GROUP_Hobgoblin, GROUP_Humans, GROUP_Ogres, GROUP_Origins, GROUP_SmartUndead, GROUP_Tiefling, GROUP_Trolls
